item.title: Whiskey Jo's Pub & Grub
item.description: Join us for our debut at the recently opened Whiskey Jo's Pub & Grub. No cover charge!

item.title: Rockin' the Block at Newbo - August 2019
item.description: The CRB performing at Rockin’ the Block - Newbo City Market in August 2019.

item.title: Newbo Rock the Block
item.description: Free outdoor concert. Bring your lawn chairs, but leave your coolers at home. Food and drink vendors are available on site.

item.title: St. Ludmila's Kolach Festival
item.description: Free concert at the family-friendly festival!

item.title: St. Ludmila's Kolach Festival - June 2019
item.description: The CRB performing at St. Ludmila's Kolach Festival - Cedar Rapids, IA in June 2019.

item.title: Newbo Rock the Block
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we return to the Newbo City Market to Rock the Block! Opening for the CRB at 5:30pm will be the Country Band. Bring your lawn chairs (no coolers please) for a free concert on the grounds of the Newbo City Market. Plenty of food and drink vendors will be available on-site.

item.title: FREDSTOCK
item.description: A free house concert featuring multiple bands and musicians. More details to follow!

item.title: Cedar Rapids Corvette Club Car Show
item.description: The Compass Rose Band will perform from 12:00pm - 2:30pm during the car show. Free admission. More details to follow at www.cedarrapidscorvetteclub.com.

item.title: Rock the Block
item.description: Join The Compass Rose Band for a free show at the Newbo City Market outdoor stage for their “Rock The Block” summer concert series. Bring your lawn chairs for a evening of great music and friendship!

item.title: Private Party
item.description: Black and Gold Study Group, end of the year party.

item.title: Jimmy Buffett Night at the Cedar Rapids Kernels
Jimmy Buffett Night at the Cedar Rapids Kernels
Cedar River Landing
item.description: Come out and party with The Compass Rose Band at one of Cedar Rapids best venues for LIVE MUSIC! And as always, NO COVER CHARGE!

item.title: The Compass Rose Band at The Red Baron
item.description: Work off that Thanksgiving dinner by dancing the night away with The CRB. No Cover Charge!!!

item.title: Otis' Tailgators Post Game Party
item.description: Help us celebrate the win over the Purdue Boilermakers!

item.title: Jimmy Buffet Night at the Cedar Rapids Kernels
item.description: Concert begins immediately following the game.
